methods.constructor: Set state variables and map asset pairs to their oracles

getAndValidateAdapter(string).notice: Gets the integration for the module with the passed in name. Validates that the address is not empty

removeModule().notice: Called by a CKToken to notify that this module was removed from the CK token. Any logic can be included in case checks need to be made or state needs to be cleared.
